item.description:
You guys asked for it so here it is....

This special evening is being hosted by Lou Swinand in his home in Shrewsbury....thank you Lou!

Here is how it works!

Please note: You need to RSVP to the event. We are limiting the number of folks who can attend. We do this so each person will have the chance to have their work critiqued...Please - if you have been to a crit before do not attend this one, its for folks who have not had a chance to get in on one before!

Please bring only two images. This way everyone gets a chance to have work critiqued by everyone else. Anyone bringing more than two prints will be flogged. It's just not fair to the others. (You know who you are... )

Please feel free to bring a snack or a drink to share with the others....

The critique will end at 10 pm.

If anyone has any questions, comments - please let us know!

Cheers,

Donna and Scott

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Roundtable Critique
